name: fastrender
description: Real-time Markdown and LaTeX rendering library using WebAssembly
author: Rach Pradhan

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --target web && mkdir -p dist/types && cp src/fastrender.d.ts dist/types/ && bun build ./src/fastrender.ts --outdir ./dist --target browser && cp pkg/*.wasm dist/
scripts.publish: bun run build && bun run test && npm publish
